website_summaries.verdict: In Ahnu’s Montara III Boot eVent, female adventurers are quite likely to be floored by its remarkable lightness, astonishing ankle support, and insane amounts of comfort. Such impressive qualities are even made sweeter by the footwear’s practically non-existent break-in period. That said, this looker of a boot might be too spacious at the toe for some, especially for those whose forefoot is on the slimmer side. All things considered, despite the fit issue concerning its toe box, the boot still sparkles with excellent traits.
pros: Numerous verified buyers applauded the Ahnu Montara III Boot eVent’s exceptional level of comfort
Some of them linked this quality to the pig leather lining engineered around the boot’s collar
Its jaw-dropping lightness stumped a considerable number of reviewers
Many wearers were successfully able to break in this footgear in no time
The Montara III Boot WP impressed about a dozen owners with its incredible ankle support
This Ahnu gear was commended by several hikers for having fantastic waterproofing
Some users raved about the hiker’s exquisite aesthetics
Most of them attributed its great looks to its fun color schemes
A few consumers swore by the shoe’s super-precise fit when it comes to length
Its decent arch support was praised by about a handful of testers
A couple of buyers considered their purchase of the Ahnu Montara III waterproof hiking boots were a worthy enough investment
One patron was mesmerized by the boot’s amazing ability to claw into different types of terrain
cons: This Ahnu women’s Montara boot disappointed a couple of reviewers for having a sloppy toe box
A tiny percentage of consumers were not happy about the flimsy construction quality of this Montara boot by Ahnu

customer_reviews.title: I loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to wear while walking the Camino de Santiago (Camino del Norte-from Irún to Santiago de Compostela-800 km)...I wore them daily from June 1 to July 12, hiking an average of 20 km daily—-in deep thick mud, in rain, up and down hills, on coastal paths, on hot days, and on pavement....I got one small insignificant blister and that’s it!!! Boots were perfect—-light weight, water and mud proof....I loved them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. The seller sent me seconds...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited! They arrived early but they’re sewn incorrectly and the red mark on the tongue tells me they’re seconds. If I had realized I wouldn’t have bought them. Those wrinkles on the side and tongue are sewn in, I can’t imagine I would be able to hike in them without creating a lot of blisters. That is that specific pair of boots from seller Chervyak (sp?) The whole line of boots by TEVA are my favorite though. A little narrow, which is great for me, and support on the lighter side of firm
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ahnu is the Go to Boot
customer_reviews.text: They are labeled as Men’s, however, when they arrived and I opened they came as I ordered, EU 39 which is a women’s US 9. This is my second pair of Ahnu hiking boots and I LOVE them. Best boot I had since my Ecco’s which they don’t make (style) anymore. So this is the Brand from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Leechan

customer_reviews.title: Teva destroyed original Ahnu
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first pair. I replaced them recently hoping to get the same quality and comfort . This new pair have been uncomfortable and hurt my feet . Since Teva took over Ahnu , the boots are totally different . I even took them to the shoe repair to stretch them out still no luck . If anybody wants to buy these off me these second rate teeva /Ahnu boots I’ll give them a good deal. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Will Gramlich

customer_reviews.title: Good boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and another pair from this brand for a hiking trip. I ended up going with the other boot solely based on color available, but these were awesome and I was sad to send them back. They were sturdy, comfortable, and fit true to size (even with thick wool socks on). I obviously didn’t hike in them so I can’t attest to how they hold up in the long run, but they seemed well-made and the other boot from this brand held up great for me. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Just right for me
customer_reviews.text: For my feet the 10.5 seems comfy and I normally need a wide but these are good right out of the box. Lightweight so comfortable. I have severe mid-foot arthritis and I take the removable sole insert out and put my orthotics in. Kind of like Goldilocks and 3 bears- found a boot that is “just right” for me. I do not think they make this and I was glad to have found this one.
customer_reviews.author: SLJ

customer_reviews.title: Not like previous model. Very stiff and don't break in.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these last year and ran them into the ground. They were the best boots I've ever owned. So once they started to wear out, I ordered a pair of this newer model. VERY DISSAPOINTED. The leather is stiff and the heel is narrow. I gave them a good chance but they fit weird and never broke in. They tore my feet up. I am selling them and buying some Merrels. They need to go back to the materials they used on the old Montaras.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ahnus. Comfortable right out of the box. My go to boot for work. Hiking, dog walking, working in garden. I Dont like the slick boot laces. THE LACES DONT STAY TIGHT UNLESS DOUBLE KNOTTED. I have arthritis in my hands it makes this part of difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. on the Coast

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Ahnu boot!
customer_reviews.text: I have three pairs of the Ahnu Montara boot and I loved them. Wore throughout Africa, Galapagos, Amazon, Antarctica, etc. to everyday hikes. Live in them and love them! These were not the same boots. The material was cheap and not leather. The design was modified and not nearly as attractive. The color called chocolate chip is awful. I have two beautiful chocolate brown pairs and beautiful blue apr with light contrasting blue stitching, just gorgeous! All sorts of compliments on my last ones. These new ones I sent back. Teva-fix this!
customer_reviews.author: kitcat

customer_reviews.title: The BEST hiking boots....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Ahnu boots for 10 years. It was time to replace my old ones and I was thrilled to find them on Amazon. I hike in creeks, steep elevations, all weather conditions and these boots hold up for years. I do feel since Teva bought them, the quality declined a tad but they’re still fantastic. My feet stay dry even when standing in water. I highy recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KatF

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a leather boot should.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little snug on my admittedly wide foot (which was a little tighter than expected), BUT it is leather, so it stretches with wear. It was comfortable right out of the box with the arch being perfect for middle height arches. You will need to wear thick socks for cold climates. Also, I suggest sizing up if you are between sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these boots because I wanted to hike and trek in snow. but wanted light weight and nothing to clunky. These fit the mold. Yes, they are waterproof in snow, though I didn't go into rivers to anything that included rain. but, they are warm and sturdy. I recommend though for these to Size a whole size up! ( I am 7 1/2 and I bought an 8 1/2) if you intent to wear heavier socks and use inserts to add cushion and lengthen the life of your boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ama AA

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Boots
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve worn these boots 12 miles and I’ve only experienced minor issues associated with wearing them too far too soon. With a little more break-in time these will be perfection. I’ve worn them in water and can attest to them being water proof. They provide excellent ankle support and the cutout in the back prevents them from rubbing my Achilles. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Lee-lah

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have this same pair of boots from when they were not part of Teva. I love them. This ones feel the same but I haven’t use them for hiking yet. Hope they kept the same details in the construction that make them great. The Design is very attractive too. I use a 7 or 7 1/2 and I bought a 7 1/2 which are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my Ahnu's prior to Teva
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of Ahnus 5 years ago and they lasted me many years. In my first summer with these (around 10 hikes) these have already started to give me blisters and started to stretch so that my toes now hit the front. I don't think I can keep wearing these as my feet are just destroyed by the end of the hiking day.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove and very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Women's Hiking boots. Love these hikers. lightweight and waterproof these books make it a breeze to take a hike or even a jog through all terrain keeping feet dry and not feeling like your working at picking up your feet. didn't even have to 'break' them in. Only off putting feature that is of any notice is the opening for the foot as it is a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Give them a chance!
customer_reviews.text: Almost sent them back after trying on at first. Decided to walk around the house for a bit since I got a great deal on them. Within a few minutes, they were very comfortable and have been a go to pair of shoes for me. Love that they are waterproof, and they are now as comfortable as any tennis shoe I have.
customer_reviews.author: ralk

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had Ahnu Montara in leather for 3 years and I put over 3000 miles in it. Perfect shoes. The only reason I wanted new ones was because of the sole losing some grip. I ordered the only one I found in Suede material and it's already damaged after less than one month!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room for toes
customer_reviews.text: My foot is really a size 11, or maybe even a 10, but I have had to go up to a size 12 for most of my shoes as my toes are tall. This boot in size 11 is tall in the toe area and they don't look huge. I am really happy with them, and it was a struggle to find shoes to do a lot of walking that didn't hurt my tall toes.
customer_reviews.author: Teth

customer_reviews.title: Ripped the first day I wore them
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots. However, the FIRST time I wore them the lacing ripped.
customer_reviews.author: goodseller29

customer_reviews.title: Light and attractive but quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely picky when it comes to boots. I was looking for something to wear while hiking in Iceland that wouldn’t be hot but would also be water proof. This boot checked those boxes. Plus, it’s cute, not huge, and was very comfortable. However, after the first wear, they tore on a very easy hike. I was so disappointed and had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Teva hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: These hiking boots are very comfortable and cute. They fit true to size. Great for chilly wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, mid-height, waterproof hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome hiking shoes, I use and abuse them for work and they've held up great over many miles of field checks. Comfortable with thick socks, waterproof and easy to get on and off. Durable and comfortable shoes that I would highly recommend to a friend and looking into getting another pair before these get ground to dust.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Garza

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: I just received the boots. They seem very comfortable but they do run a little narrow so I recommend considering a wider shoe for some with bigger feet. Also there is red permanent marker writing on the inside of the right shoe which I’m not thrilled about. I would recommend this shoe but not from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gwizdz

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ahnus. My first pair was a lower hiking shoe & I have been very pleased with them, so when I saw these on sale at a great price I grabbed them. I had been looking for a higher top hiking boot & glad I found the Ahnu hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy in TN

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this product to work in the grass in the garden walking on uneven ground. I have bad ankles and needed ankle support. These boots are extremely comfortable well cushioned good arch support and great ankle support. I absolutely love them, wish I had bought them years earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hiking in spring in Ushuaia argentenia, wanted a waterproof, lightweight shoe since I don’t like heavy boots. You get what you pay for. Spend the money and get a high quality boot. It was $30 less than bass pro shop and I got the color I wanted, Blue
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes because they are not tight in the toe box. I love hiking, but I have bunions, so certain shoes put a lot of pressure on my feet and it can cause a lot of pain. I have needed to get some appropriate hiking shoes with good support, lightweight and were not tight in the toe box. These shoes met all of my criteria. The only reason I give this a 4 stars and not a 5 was that after a few hikes a small portion of stitching came undone. Other than that these shoes are great and I would highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. This is my 2nd pair. The first lasted 4+ years, hiking daily. II use custom orthotics in them for arch support. I wore them to hike a 5-mile moderate trail the first day, with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: DiggerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Boots. They have a wide toe box and the arch which is perfect for my feet. Constantly receiving comments while wearing. The size is accurate as stated. Both of my boots are women size 9 in gray and and reddish brown colors.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this brand and style boot for six years. This year was different in that the fit around the ankle rubbed so badly I could hardly stand to wear them at all. I have NEVER had this problem with Ahnu boots. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: High tops hurt my shin.
customer_reviews.text: I really like everything about the boots except the press on my shin. These are my 3rd pair of this brand with the high top. Low tops are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA J. CLUTINGER

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was very stiff. Did not appear to be made of leather at all. Painful to walk in. Not what I expected in a hiking boot. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, gravel magnets
customer_reviews.text: A big on the big side. Gravel and rocks inside shoe after taking less than 20 steps on a paved road. Just got back from a quick snowshoe, spring conditions and my feet are wet and my socks are soaked, as in dripping. Not happy at all. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Okjane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: These boots feel so incredibly cheap. I have some older Ahnu boots that are so soft and comfortable. These feel like cardboard. There is no way they’d hold up for long. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: tnelfrank

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, no break in
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great, a lot on the market are too wide for me. They are a good height, good support and no breaking in. Great for extensive day hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Carolg

customer_reviews.title: I’m a repeat buyer of these; a little larger/ looser than the last pair!
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than expected - and strangely, a bit larger than the last pair!
customer_reviews.author: RadioMaven

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I went to Cabelas to find a good hiking shoe these were their most expensive. I google the shoes and saw that Amazon had them for $60 less. They feel wonderful and I saved a lot. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Have a high arch and these were perfect for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Have a high arch and these were perfect for hiking. Also wore to work when weeding and gardening for my summer job. Only been 4 months so not sure how they will hold up long term
customer_reviews.author: JP01

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I tried several pairs of hiking boots and these were the most comfortable, while also providing ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: All The Things

customer_reviews.title: The best ankle boot on the market
customer_reviews.text: This boot is really second pair of Anhu boots I have purchased for my wife. She loves them. Excellent fit. Nice color scheme. And they really are warm and waterproof. I will buy her a third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Booker

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, very comfortable I did change the insole as it had too much of an arch support for my liking Best hiking shoes I’ve purchased so far
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. They are comfortable and light weight. I day hike up to 9 miles RT. The boots have never caused me any trouble. I am hooked on Anhu. They have come down in price too. I hope they never stop making this boot.
customer_reviews.author: Zlee63

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! These are great hiking boots. Great traction and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair . First pair lasted 12 years. Comfortable . Best hiking boots ever.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Fit not as same as past Ahnu's
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that these Ahnu's are not the same as my previous ones. They do not have as much padding & support. I bought new SuperFeet insoles which helped some, but I still had a lot of movement even with heavier socks. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly at a size 10. Comfortable right out the box. Laces are a bit slick so I double knot.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Best women's hiking boot, comfort A plus
customer_reviews.text: I would rather they were all black I wear these at work, these are my 4th pair of black boots in 4-years. Waterproof and give great medium support for my ankles. Comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Justdee Scott

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very well pleased with these boots. They fit right out of the box. They fit true to size. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: nomo

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase on Amazon to date
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! Gorgeous color and quality. While the cost is intimidating, these are forever shoes and your one stop shop for a lifetime pair of hiking boots. The fit is comfortable, durable, and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I so love this shoes. Fits perfect on my feet size 5.5, and I still have room to wiggle my toes. It felt so good on my feet when hiking! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Damitraki

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and fit! I am confident of my footing with these shoes. The arch support is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Goose

customer_reviews.title: First pair of hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: My very first pair of hiking boots! Gearing up for a trip to our National Parks and my daughter-in-Las recommended these boots..she loves hers. They are breaking in nicely. They are functional and still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Doctormom

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I ever owned. Comfy right out of the box!!! Hiked in cold weather and my feet stayed toasty. I love these so much I got another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mammacous

customer_reviews.title: they’re great boots.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots twice and each time received Women’s boots. I believe the on-line description is incorrect. The item # is the same in the description as was on the box, but on-line the number represents a mans boot and on the box it represents a women’s boot. Be aware that what you order may actually be a women’s size boot. Other than that, they’re great boots.
customer_reviews.author: L.artisan

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They were a little stiff to start but after an hour in them they fit wonderfully. My favorite pair of hiking boots by far.
customer_reviews.author: anniefredricka

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: After trying 3 different brands these were worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Ahnu was better before Teva
customer_reviews.text: Hate what Teva did to Ahnu not the same shoes as before.
customer_reviews.author: xochilt fregoso

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these boots daily to break them in. Haven't taken first hike in them yet but will update as soon as I do. So far, they offer great ankle support and very comfy on the bottoms of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Aliciaf

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Used for casual hiking in a national park. Great traction on slippery slopes. Waterproof for wading and creek crossing. Comfortable immediately - no break in period required for me. Hopefully they last many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I wore them for a steep nine mile hike in the Catskills, and they did really well! The best thing about them is how lightweight they are.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Fit great; poor traction
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t as much grip as I’d like on the bottom, but otherwise very please with these hiking boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot! Light weight and fits perfectly. Easy to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, great fit
customer_reviews.text: They are meant to wear thicker socks like Nike or hiking socks. They are waterproof, and the person I bought them off of was awesome! 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Remarkably comfortable and supportive. I didn't even have to break them in. So grateful I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and the price was just right. This is my first time ordering shoes online and the size fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kannia Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: I love my new boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my new boots!!! Totally water proof and comfortable. Wore them for a week camping and hiking in the Rocky Mountians. No wet feet or blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weinzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and also very cute
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for a week long hiking trip and I was very happy with them! The are sturdy, did not cause any blisters, the sole did not slip even on granite and are actually very cute shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Tough & pretty hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight sturdy hiking boots. Color is lovely - Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Ripped at the seems after 3 months. I work in landscaping and these boots did not hold up. Waterproofing was minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 1/2 so I could wear thick socks. They fit perfectly and are soooo comfortable. I bought them to wear in the snow. Haven't tested the waterproofing yet but I think they'll work out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Wear them everyday and my feet never hurt. So comfy
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great company. Shoes just didn’t fit my foot this time
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color combination but the fit wasn’t perfect on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Duren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT MENS. THESE ARE WOMENS BOOTS EVEN THOUGH THEY CLEARLY SAY MENS. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Traveller Bob

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic boots. My daughter is a welder and these are perfect work shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie McGovern

product_meta.title: Ahnu Men's W Montara Iii Boot Event Hiking
product_meta.description: Part of the Ahnu by Teva collection, this lightweight, hiking boot carries you comfortably over terrains of the muddy, rocky and rugged variety. Featuring waterproof nubuck leather, a waterproof-breathable event membrane, a super-gripping Vibram outsole and Ahnu Numentum® hike technology to keep your foot extra stable on challenging trails.
feature_bullets: -Waterproof-nubuck upper seals out the elements to keep your feet dry.
-Pig leather lining provides luxurious interior comfort
-eVent Waterproof membrane seals out rain, puddles and other things that splash to keep your feet dry.
- Custom Vibram Megagrip Outsole for outstanding traction and durability
-Dual Density EVA Midsole with Numentum technology
